channel.title: hungary on Allen's Whiteboard
channel.description: Recent content in hungary on Allen's Whiteboard

item.title: Christmas across Eastern Europe (3): Hungary
item.description: We arrived in Budapest two days ago. It was a larger, more modern city split by the large Danube into Buda and Pest. We visited the magnificent Parliament building – indeed it was magnificent, yet maybe bacause of the poor English of the guide or the seemingly too many museums, I felt kinda tired about all the decorations inside it. We all looked tired. It was a nice little cafe for yesterday’s dinner.
